awards.text: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 36 wins & 38 nominations.

fullplot: Adult film director Jack Horner is always on the lookout for new talent and it's only by chance that he meets Eddie Adams who is working as a busboy in a restaurant. Eddie is young, good looking and plenty of libido to spare. Using the screen name Dirk Diggler, he quickly rises to the top of his industry winning awards year after year. Drugs and ego however come between Dirk and those around him and he soon finds that fame is fleeting.
plot: The story of a young man's adventures in the Californian pornography industry of the late 1970s and early 1980s.
title: Boogie Nights

tomatoes.consensus: Grounded in strong characters, bold themes, and subtle storytelling, Boogie Nights is a groundbreaking film both for director P.T. Anderson and star Mark Wahlberg.
